title: Compiler TSX
description: The Compiler TSX is a feature that allows the TypeScript compiler to process and compile `*.tsx` files, supporting JSX in TypeScript.
content: The specialized tool that processes JSX and TSX syntax, which combine JavaScript/TypeScript with HTML-like tags, translating them into standard JavaScript. This enables browsers to understand and render interactive elements, ensuring compatibility and functionality across web applications that use these modern syntax styles.
